title: Understanding Ageism
text: Ageism is a form of discrimination that involves prejudices against individuals based on their age. It often involves stereotypes that are not accurate.

title: Identifying the Correct Definition
text: Consider the stereotypes and assumptions made about older adults. Are these stereotypes generally positive or negative?

hintAnswer: discrimination of older adults due to stereotypes that are negative and inaccurate
title: Choosing the Correct Answer
text: Which of the following best describes ageism?
choices: discrimination of older adults due to stereotypes that are negative and inaccurate
discrimination of younger adults due to stereotypes that are negative and inaccurate
discrimination of older adults due to stereotypes that are negative but accurate
discrimination of younger adults due to stereotypes that are negative but accurate
